metadata.title: CVE-2024-9675 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Buildah. Cache mounts do not properly validatethat user-specified paths for the cache are within our cache directory,allowing a `RUN` instruction in a Container file to mount an arbitrarydirectory from the host (read/write) into the container as long as thosefiles can be accessed by the user running Buildah.

criterions.comment: golang-github-containers-buildah package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
